title: Runes
body:
Hi,
Someone know what riot doing with new runes in PBE.
If someone know tell for me plz.
#mainzyra!!{{champion:143}}

replies.body: Hey there, PBE accounts now receive a daily stipend arond noon pacific time instead of a giant balance.  More info is also available on the [PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/).  I hope that helps, and thanks for helping out!
